content: Hello! I'm trying to set up Roc in the Helix editor and when i run hx --health roc I get checkmarks for everything except DAP and when I'm in a roc file I think the LSP is working and formatter works well but all the text is white. Is this a known issue? Have I done something wrong? Help appreciated! C:
I think @Brendan Hansknecht may use helix
Did you build the grammar files and copy the treesitter query files as described here? https://github.com/faldor20/tree-sitter-roc

Bildschirmfoto-vom-2024-06-18-20-00-47.png
This is how it looks in my helix setup (with dracula theme).

Oh that's embarrassing lol. I built it before adding the files because that is the order they do it in the guide but I think I had to build it again after adding the queries to the runtime. It now works nicely! Thank you!
Pontus Post has marked this topic as resolved.
